text:
{"type":"task_assignment","taskId":"1","subject":"Phase 1: Foundation - DB tables, config, requirements","description":"Edit backend/database.py to add collection_jobs and collection_candidates tables with indexes. Add ALTER TABLE for reference_images (collection_job_id, perceptual_hash columns). Edit backend/config.py to add GOOGLE_CSE_API_KEY, GOOGLE_CSE_ID, COLLECTION_DIR. Edit requirements.txt to add imagehash>=4.3.1. Update .env.example if exists.

Key patterns from existing code:
- Tables use TEXT DEFAULT (datetime('now')) for timestamps
- Foreign keys with ON DELETE CASCADE where appropriate
- get_connection() returns sqlite3.Connection with row_factory
- Config uses os.getenv() and Path objects
- DATA_DIR is the base for all paths","assignedBy":"team-lead","timestamp":"2026-02-10T03:16:50.817Z"}

{"type":"shutdown_request","requestId":"shutdown-1770693513309@backend-foundation","from":"team-lead","reason":"Phase 1 is complete. Thank you for your work. Shutting down.","timestamp":"2026-02-10T03:18:33.309Z"}
